title: Marine biomes - low light and great pressure

content.description: Directions: The following questions(s) refer to the figure below, which shows five different marine zones.
content.question: The zone in which species are adapted to the lowest light and the highest pressure

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain relationships between different characteristics of environmental concepts, processes, or models represented visually. a. In theoretical contexts. b. In applied contexts.
